Sunshine Peep - Bundle Pack - Summer Rain
kDesc

Let the Sunshine in with with warm rays of Sunshine Peep! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take her outside of your apartment as a Companion or place her on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Sunshine Peep - Summer Rain
 ・Sunshine Peep - Static Mini - Summer Rain
 ・Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - Summer Rain


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Laisse entrer les rayons chauds du soleil de Sunshine Peep! C'est trois en un avec Peep fun supplementaire. Tu peux contrôler ton Peep avec des animations et manœuvres personnalisées. Prends-la à l'extérieur de ton appartement comme Compagne ou expose la à ton appartement dans sa boite Peep-a-Boo. Rassemble les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir![#Legal]

Lass die Sonne mit warmen Strahlen herein mit Sunshine Peep! Du bekommst sie im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß! Bring dein Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm sie als Gefährtin mit nach draußen oder stelle sie in deiner Wohnung in ihre Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus! [#Legal]

Lascia entrare i caldi raggi del sole di Sunshine Peep! Divertimento extra Peep al tre per uno! Porta il tuo Peep nel tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio. Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portala fuori dal tuo appartamento come Companion oppure mettila in mostra nel tuo appartamento nella sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Colleziona tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

Deja que entre el Sol con los rayos de sol de Sunshine Peep! Más diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva tu Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_14 [#Legal]

Sunshine Peep의 따뜻한 햇살을 느껴 보세요! 추가 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Sunshine Peep - 여름비
 ●Sunshine Peep - Static Mini - 여름비
 ●Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - 여름비


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

Let the Sunshine in with warm rays of Sunshine Peep! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take her outside of your apartment as a Companion or place her on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Sunshine Peep - Summer Rain
 ・Sunshine Peep - Static Mini - Summer Rain
 ・Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - Summer Rain


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Sunshine Peep帶來溫暖的陽光！給您特別的Peep樂趣！帶Peep進入您家，開始玩樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。她可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將她放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子，成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！本組合包含以下商品：


●Sunshine Peep - 梅雨季
 ●Sunshine Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 梅雨季
 ●Sunshine Peep - Heavy Pet - 梅雨季


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
